column4: Hi! I have a usb 3g modem. It has flash storage, that mounts automatically. I was wondering if I could make my system completely ignore this part of the device.
run:  lsusb   one line will ientify the device, use the 8 character hex ID to find guides
the modeswitch works, but is there a way to ignore the storage part altogether? sometimes i need to eject this part to speed up modeswitch(i guess)
no it will always be storage until usb_modeswitch happens. The storage is to install the driver automagically as, apparently, using an installdriver media is too hard for windows users (annoying)
